title: Guns and gold win in 2025, but other ‘safety’ trades bomb
description: It was a year marked by turbulence, conflict, and rumbling artificial intelligence bubble fears
content:
Precious metals were the clear winner in 2025, while pretty much all other traditional “safe haven” investments underperformed. That’s remarkable in a year marked by turbulence, conflict, and rumbling artificial intelligence bubble fears.
Economies r... [4503 chars]

title: Global investors turn to Chinese AI as Wall Street fears bubble
description: HONG KONG/NEW YORK, Dec 23 (Reuters) - Global investors are increasing their wagers on Chinese artificial intelligence companies, betting on the next DeepSeek

title: DeSantis at odds with Trump on key policies
description: Recently DeSantis has taken positions at odds with Trump on major issues: artificial intelligence, oil drilling off Florida’s coast and marijuana.
content:

title: Why governance dominates global debates on ethical artificial intelligence
description: Responsible AI is not a fixed concept but a negotiated one. Rather than analyzing official policy documents alone, the authors turn to expert discourse generated through the World University Network, a multinational academic consortium that convened a series of webinars focused on responsible and ethical AI. These discussions brought together scholars, policymakers, and practitioners from multiple countries and disciplines, creating a rare dataset of live, interactive expert communication.
content: Global debates over artificial intelligence (AI) are increasingly dominated by calls for responsibility, ethics, and accountability, yet there remains little agreement on what responsible AI actually means in practice. Governments, technology firms, ... [8246 chars]

title: How AI Is Transforming Coloring Pages Into Smart Creative Tools
description: Artificial intelligence is reshaping how people work, learn, and express creativity. From content generation and design automation to personalized education and digital art, AI is increasingly embedded in everyday tools. One of the most surprising areas of transformation is a familiar creative activity that many associate with childhood: coloring. What was once a static, paper-based […]

title: AI Can Be As Good As Humans, Tesla And Google DeepMind CEOs Say Yes But Yann LeCun.....
description: The debate on Artificial General Intelligence (AGI) intensified following comments from leading AI figures. Yann LeCun, former AI chief at Meta, argued that general intelligence does not exist, even in humans, as it varies based on individual strengths., Technology & Science, Times Now
content:
